==Format==
===Round 1 Pools===
Round 1 Pools are 16-man Double Elimination Bracket Pools. Three players from each pool advance to Round 2 Pools; one from the Winners Bracket, and two from the Losers bracket.

===Round 2 Pools===
Round 2 Pools are 24-man Double Elimination Bracket Pools. Four players from each pool advance to the [[Pound_2016/Singles_Bracket|Top 32 Singles Bracket]]; two from the Winners Bracket, and two from the Losers bracket.
